
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/ZYPLJ/p/18710924" title="发布于 2025-02-12 09:23">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET Core + Vue3  个人博客后台系统更新啦~</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="基于vue-pure-admin框架搭建的博客后台系统">基于vue-pure-admin框架搭建的博客后台系统</h1>
<p><a href="LICENSE" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><img src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/pure-admin/vue-pure-admin.svg" alt="license" loading="lazy"></a></p>
<h2 id="介绍">介绍</h2>
<p>本项目基于 <a href="https://github.com/pure-admin/vue-pure-admin" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">vue-pure-admin</a> 开发，原本博客后台使用<a href="https://github.com/Deali-Axy/StarBlog" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">StarBlog</a>升级vue3版本搭建，鉴于被我改得烂七八糟，所以这次使用了新的架子搭建。</p>
<h2 id="项目地址">项目地址</h2>
<p><a href="https://github.com/ZyPLJ/vue-zyblog-pure" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/ZyPLJ/vue-zyblog-pure</a></p>
<h2 id="配套后端项目地址">配套后端项目地址</h2>
<p>更新之后后台地址：<a href="https://github.com/ZyPLJ/ZYBlog" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">ZyPLJ/ZYBlog: 这是Personalblog的新版本库</a></p>
<p>老版本地址：<a href="https://github.com/ZyPLJ/personalblog" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">ZyPLJ/personalblog: 可以上传md文件的.net6个人博客系统。</a></p>
<h2 id="部分截图">部分截图</h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091831902-1723893637.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091837618-1920010456.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091844848-1598155245.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091850587-663379353.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091855815-1155219058.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3091176/202502/3091176-20250212091900858-514342408.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="开发环境">开发环境</h2>
<p><a href="https://pure-admin.cn/pages/start/#%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">快速开始 | Pure Admin 保姆级文档</a> <a href="https://pure-admin.cn/pages/start/#%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://pure-admin.cn/pages/start/#开发环境</a></p>
<h2 id="下载依赖">下载依赖</h2>
<pre><code>pnpm install
</code></pre>
<h2 id="运行">运行</h2>
<pre><code>pnpm dev
</code></pre>
<h2 id="打包">打包</h2>
<pre><code>pnpm build
</code></pre>
<h2 id="docker部署">Docker部署</h2>
<pre><code class="language-dockerfile">docker build -t 容器名 .

docker run -d -p 8031:8031 --name 容器名 -v 服务器项目路径/dist:/usr/share/nginx/html 容器名
</code></pre>
<h2 id="配套保姆级文档">配套保姆级文档</h2>
<p>vue-pure-admin提供了非常项目的开发和部署文档，可以根据自己的需求快速开发后台系统。</p>
<p><a href="https://pure-admin.github.io/pure-admin-doc" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">点我查看 vue-pure-admin 文档</a></p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
